Violated Laws--Natural and Spiritual 

                                            (1898) D.A. 824 
     197. To many of the afflicted ones who received healing, Christ said, "Sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee." Thus He taught that disease is the result of violating God's laws, both natural and spiritual. The great misery 
                                                                           121
in the world would not exist, did men but live in harmony with the Creator's plan.
